column6:
Your Highness wishes to remind
the women in the harem of good manners.

column6:
I do understand that jealousy and spite
are the flaws in a woman's character.

Dull-witted as I am,
I tolerate no flaws in my character.
But you can't expect other concubines to do the same.

column3: 反复无常之事可是见得多了
column6:
Over all these years in the palace,
fickleness has been ever so constant in the human heart.

column3: 娘娘既让姐姐抄录女论语
column6: Thank Your Highness for the reminder.

column3: 为的就是防止后宫争宠
column6: Analects for Women always reminds us against strife and rivalries.

column3: 娘娘用心良苦 妹妹们一定谨遵
column6: We will follow Your Highness's thoughtful advice.

column3: 莞贵人这话听着真是舒服
column6: It is very pleasant to converse with Lady Sourire.

column3: 沈贵人与莞贵人待得久了
嘴皮子功夫也日渐伶俐了
column6: And Lady Shen has a way with words just like your best friend.
This is nothing to be made light of.

column3: 一大早的 给皇后请安
又说了这会子话 还真是乏了
column6: So much for all the talks in the morning.
We will go.
Now you know how it is.
Meizhuang, do you think that I am in the wrong?

column3: 若不是你 也会有旁人
column6:
His Majesty would always
grow fond of concubines other than myself.

column3: 若是旁人 我宁愿是你
column6: I'd rather it is you than anyone else.
Privately, I'm afraid the other concubines would do harm to myself.
But you won't.
Meizhuang.
You are the only one I can trust in the palace.

column3: 终究不是一起长大的情分
column6:
We are friends with Lingrong
but that's not like us growing up together.

column3: 若是连你我都不能相互扶持

column6: We have to support each other through the decades yet to come.

column3: 姐姐 有些事虽非我意料
也并非我一力可以避免
column6: Meizhuang, there are things that I cannot foresee or forbid.

column3: 我与姐姐的情谊一如从前
column6:
No matter what the future holds,
our friendship will never change.

column3: 姐姐也莫要与我生分了
column6:
I hope you won't keep me at a distance
if His Majesty keeps his fondness of me.

column3: 以你我的天资 得宠是意料中事
column6: His fondness is always expected for who you are.

column3: 即便不能保证宠眷不衰
也要留住这性命 不能牵连族人
column6: Otherwise, we have to survive in the harem to protect our families.
(thunder rumbling)
Why are you awake?
I heard the rain.
Do you have something on your mind?
No.
Don't lie to me.
Your Majesty, I'm scared.
Of what?

column3: 皇上可否听过集宠于一身
column6:
Did Your Majesty know that
the most beloved concubine is also the most resented?

column3: 怎么 有人难为你吗
column6: Did anyone give you trouble?

column3: 没有 没有人为难臣妾
column6: No, no one did.

column3: 雨露均沾 六宫祥和

column6:

so they can bloom and bear fruits.
I dare not wish for Your Majesty's exclusive love.
Why not?

column3: 六宫妃嫔与前朝盘根错节

column6:
The concubines are inextricably intertwined
with the powers at the imperial court.
Your Majesty is a sensible emperor.
Am I?
It's been seven days.

column3: 若后宫成了怨气所钟之地
column6:
It will be more difficult for Your Majesty to administer
the state affairs if the harem is plagued by strife.

And the neglect of concubines will bring complaints
about the fickleness in Your Majesty's affection.

臣妾不能让皇上烦心 臣妾不忍

All right.
Peace and grace to Mother.
Have a seat.
Thank you, Mother.
You seem to be in good spirits today.

column6:
Lady Sourire?
I don't recall you talking about her.
She's the smart one that was selected last year.

column6: She's been sick until recently.
That's good.

column3: 就是身边有个贴心的人
column6: It's important that you have someone you like.

He is a filial son.

Consort Serein, who your father favored exclusively.

column3: 他亲额娘舒妃专宠六宫

column6: She became the target for harem-wide resentment.

column6:

when she has all the time in the world to overthink.

When you have a moment,
I'll send Lady Sourire here to seek your advice.

I'm musically illiterate.

I did.

when I saw the moon on my way back.
